# ConsoleBufferCell.WithBackground method

Generate a new cell with a different background color, but the same character and foreground as the current cell.

```csharp
public ConsoleBufferCell WithBackground(AnsiColor color)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| color | New background of the returned cell. |

## Return Value

New ConsoleBufferCell.
